Ptitle: Ernest is a |web designer| and |front-end developer|
Pdesc: He crafts responsive websites where technologies meet creativity
With_great: With great power comes great electricity bill
develop_responsive_websites: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Yakutsk, Russia. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.
Transforming_my_creativity: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.
interested: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
